attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239377. Balance of 7 year/200 000km Warranty - 7 year/150 000km Roadside Assistance
Last Service - 05/05/2022 @13934km Full Service History

The 2nd Generation Creta is powered by a 1.5l naturally aspirated engine that pushes 84kW of power with an average fuel consumption of 6.3l/100km. The distinctive bold appearance incorporates daytime LEDs with a beautiful bold grille. Other notable features include 17" Alloys, flat bottom multi-functioning steering wheel for maximum driver comfort and convenience, wireless charging pad, Android Auto and Apple CarPlay. In terms of safety features you get 6 Airbags, ABS, EBD, ESC as well as traction control. The crystal clear rear view camera and parking sensors makes parking seem effortless, this SUV really is value for money considering all the features that are included in the Creta. Don't waste any time book your test drive today!!!

Trade ins Welcome. Finance Available.
Certified Roadworthy Pre-owned.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239074. The execution of the new-generation D-Max represents a significant leap forward for one of South Africa’s most beloved bakkie models. Not only does it look the part, but the D-Max’s cabin is now on par with what’s on offer in the segment.

The 1.9-litre diesel engine has a maximum braked trailer capacity of 3 100 kg and a payload of 1 000 kg and power that will not disappoint.

This spec comes with features such as bluetooth, usb and aux port, bin lining, mag rims, tow bar,hill descent control, multi functional steering wheel and much more!

ENQUIRE NOW!

Spacious and Comfortability is 2 of their best qualities. It has cruise control which makes the long distance drive even more fun. It also serves as a great family car for all your kids to their extra mural activities and dad can take all of you on awesome road-trips to new holiday destinations. But if you don't have a big family and you just like SUV`s with spacious and well specked interior, then this will more than suffice. Call us now and book your test drive today.

The price excludes dealer fees and smash and grab protection film. Call us today to arrange a test drive. Errors and omissions Reserved. T&Cs apply
